stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server. Once per turn -> click, 4[credit]: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 card in the root of or protecting this server. If you have not installed any cards from HQ this turn, instead place 3 advancement counters on that card.

title: The Holo Man
